content: bring nature indoors with these gorgeous crochet-covered rocks designed by eco-artist margaret oomen they make great paper weights or simple objects of beauty skill level intermediate river rocks variety of colors and shapes about 3-4 7 5-10cm at widest point covers stretch to fit rocks of varying shapes and sizes aunt lydia s classic crochet thread size 10 each ball approx 350yd/320m cotton #226 natural a - 1 ball #021 linen b - 1 ball note one ball of thread will make 5 to 6 covers steel crochet hook size 8 1 5mm
